channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools Tracking of school cases stopped on June 30th, 2021. See Support our Students Alberta for the complete archived list of schools with Covid-19 cases. Final VOC in schools update was on June 28th. See Global News' Lauren Pullen archived reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Daily Covid-19 Briefing
item.description: Daily Covid-19 Briefing Wednesday, August 18, 2021 - Prepared by ALPINE1 As of July 29, 2021 the Province of Alberta has begun reducing the number of Covid-19 tests performed. Caution should be applied when interpreting these daily case and trend values as they may not be reflective of the wider population. Today 689 new cases of Covid-19 were identified in the province. The adjusted total of cases is 678 including changes to previous case numbers between April 20th and August 16th.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 6 Edmonton Zone 5 South Zone 5 Central Zone 1 North Zone 8 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, Aug 17, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Vaccines
Variants of Concern
item.description: Jump to chart type AHS Zone Charts and Maps Daily and Cumulative Charts VOC Charts: Alberta Health Services Zone Charts and Maps Alberta Health Services and the Government of Alberta Covid-19 tracker began providing active VOC cases by AHS Zone on Mar 29. Charts reflect total values reported on indicated dates. Decreases in values reflect adjusted counts by AHS.
